name: Sonic the Hedgehog: Next Level
overview: This Sonic the Hedgehog Romhack created by MarkeyJester in 2015 consists of one zone, Gust Planet, which features all new gimmicks, badniks, level design, and artwork. It also plays music of qualities that are impressive for the hardware that it is played on, and much more reminiscent of Sega CD audio quality.
